headline.main: Germany's Social Democrats, Greens Press for Same-Sex Marriage
headline.print_headline: Germany's Social Democrats, Greens Press for Same-Sex Marriage

lead_paragraph: Germany's Social Democrats (SPD), junior partners in Chancellor Angela Merkel's ruling coalition, said on Sunday they would launch a new push to legalize same-sex marriage in Germany, a move opposed in the past by Merkel's Christian Democrats.
snippet: Germany's Social Democrats (SPD), junior partners in Chancellor Angela Merkel's ruling coalition, said on Sunday they would launch a new push to legalize same-sex marriage in Germany, a move opposed in the past by Merkel's Christian Democrats....
